summary: A command‑line utility that runs a NeMo ASR model on a given dataset, writes the generated transcriptions and reference texts to TRN files, optionally applies a GLM mapping, invokes the SCTK sclite tool via subprocess, and records the resulting scoring metrics.
business_intent: Enable automated, standardized evaluation of speech‑to‑text models using sclite to compute word error rates and related scores for benchmarking and model comparison.
